channel.title: CVE Feed for Micro Focus -- Operation Bridge (containerized)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Micro Focus -- Operation Bridge (containerized)

item.title: CVE-2020-11858|2024-08-04T11:42:00.534Z -- micro%20focus -- operation%20bridge%20%28containerized%29
item.description: Code execution with escalated privileges vulnerability in Micro Focus products Operation Bridge Manager and Operation Bridge (containerized). The vulneravility affects: 1.) Operation Bridge Manager versions: 2020.05, 2019.11, 2019.05, 2018.11, 2018.05, 10.63,10.62, 10.61, 10.60, 10.12, 10.11, 10.10 and all earlier versions. 2.) Operations Bridge (containerized) versions: 2020.05, 2019.08, 2019.05, 2018.11, 2018.08, 2018.05. 2018.02 and 2017.11. The vulnerability could allow local attackers to execute code with escalated privileges.
